In the event of any dispute between the parties, the parties agree that to the extent the parties contact and involve EBay, EBay may consult with and use counsel of its own choice in connection with such dispute. You acknowledge and agree that the nature of the Program is such that in its normal operation it may access and download elements of software data from resources that are external to the computer or device running the Program, such as Program. You also acknowledge that EBay has not undertaken to provide such external resources or servers and specifically disclaims any representation or warranty as the availability, quality or performance of such resources or whether they may contain any defects which may affect the performance of the Program. EBay shall not be responsible for provision of any communications facilities or the costs associated with such communications.

data.name: Swell
data.description:
Because the lifestyle doesn't end at the sand...

SWELL is an online surf shop and boutique specializing in California lifestyle fashion for men and women. SWELL is committed to supporting the waves and beaches that support the surf lifestyle. Established leading surf brands include Billabong, RVCA, Element, Quiksilver, Roxy, Volcom, O'Neill, Nixon, Rip Curl and L*Space, as well as a hand-picked selection of styles from up-and-coming brands like Maaji, Zanerobe & Barney Cools.

Take advantage of this unique opportunity to partner with SWELL for exclusive offers, codes and various shopping events throughout the year. Free Shipping on orders $39 or more! What are you waiting for? Become a SWELL affiliate and start earning today!

SWELL.com does not allow trademark, trademark plus bidding or any misspellings of the brand name. This includes, but is not limited to:

data.name: Koral
data.description:
Koral is a fashion forward activewear brand designed for highly active lives. Founded by entrepreneur Peter Koral and designer Ilana Kugel, Koral creates versatile mix-and-match loungewear and activewear that effortlessly transition from workout to night out and everything in between. With sexy, luxurious figure-flattering fabrics and sophisticated hues, Koral elevates the female silhouette.

Take advantage of this unique opportunity to earn commission on premium activewear, sportwear and loungewear. Sign up now and become a Koral affiliate to start earning today!

Koral has a closed PPC policy. No PPC bidding is allowed of any kind.

Publishers that violate these terms and conditions risk deactivation from the program.

Please note, commission will not be given for any code, offer, or promotion that is not available and listed as active in this network. Advertiser reserves the right to reconcile or adjust the value on any transaction that is attributed to another marketing channel.

data.name: BaubleBar
data.description:
BaubleBar.com lets consumers shop the lastest in fashion jewelry at guilt-free prices. By consolidating the same designer network that sells to high-end brick and mortar stores, BaubleBar strips out the middleman to offer the same products through its private label. This fact, coupled with its ecommerce only presence, eliminates excess costs, enabling BaubleBar to remove extraneous markâup from its pricing structure to provide shoppers with the same products as a highend retailer, but at near wholesale prices. In short, we let you build your ideal jewelry box for less.

Since launching in December 2010, BaubleBar has been featured in a wide range of publications, including Women?s Wear Daily, The New York Times, InStyle, US Weekly, Business Week and Harper?s Bazaar, and has also been snapped up by a variety of celebrities, like Rihanna, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jennifer Lopez, Oprah, Selena Gomez, Giuliana Rancic and Olivia Palermo.

BaubleBar Affiliate Program Terms & Conditions:

? Incentivized Sites are allowed in the BaubleBar.com affiliate program only on a case by case basis. If you are using incentivized methods and are not approved by the Pepperjam quality team, affiliates may be subjected to commission reversal and expiration from the BaubleBar.com affiliate program. Please contact the BaubleBar Affiliate Manager (affiliates@baublebar.com) for more details.

? PPC:
? a. Affiliates MAY NOT bid on the BaubleBar.com trademarks or brands.
? b. Our trademarks include, but are not limited to: BaubleBar, BaubleBar.com.
? c. Affiliates MAY bid on all non-brand terms.
? Email Publishers are allowed in the BaubleBar.com affiliate program as long as they are CAN-SPAM compliant.
? Downloadable software partners are allowed and encouraged to join our program.
? ALL affiliates must use current/authorized promotions that are reflected through banners, text links, and coupons in Pepperjam, otherwise they may be subjected to reversal of commissions and removal from the program.
